Package View.Animations

package View.Animations
  • Related Packages

    Description
    View

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Animation
    Abstract class used to provide the common attributes and methods of the Animations.
    CardAnimation
    Customize the Animation to add the common default width and height of the ViewCard for the CardAnimation
    FlippingAnimation
    Class used to draw the ViewCard flipping when drawn from the user.
    MovingAnimation
    Class used to move the ViewCard from one point to another.
    RotatingAnimation
    Class used to draw an image rotating on its center.
    TextAnimation
    Class used to draw an image at the center of the screen for 2 seconds.
